page.title: 14The Transport of Today.
page.content: Ever since the motor car came to Britain it changed family life.Before,then,people walked to places and were late for work,or were not in time for an appointment. Now families can visit friends,drive to shops and go further afield for their holidays. People can't go anywhere without spending money on the car for petrol, road tax and insurance.A driver must have passed a test to drive alone.The car must pass a test to make sure it is roadworthy.It needs regular servicing at a garage to ensure this. A more economical form of transport is the motor bike and some people still ride bicycles!The lorry is used to transport goods from place to place. Other forms of transport used by the public are bus,rail and air services.
